p: After taking a detailed medical history and an initial clinical and radiologic examination, healthy individuals with a minimum of 20 teeth, smoker and no smoker, were selected. Clinical parameters for inclusion were: diagnosis of severe (at least 2 interproximal sites with CAL ≥ 6 mm and 1 interproximal site with PD ≥ 5 mm) or moderate (at least 2 interproximal sites with CAL ≥ 4 mm or 2 interproximal sites with PD ≥ 5 mm) periodontitis according to the Page and Eke classification ( Page and Eke, 2007).
